note: I am a husband, dad, pulmonologist, and advocate. Rare Disease Dad. Science over fiction. Truth over lies. Trying to better the world a little bit at a time. American Lung Association Board Member. Views my own. He/Him. @maddog1066 on Twitter if I'm still there.
